schema.text: AC dat object definitions / documentation. Heavily based off of ACE.DatReader FileTypes

type.name: Stab
type.text: Information about a static object spawn.

field.name: Id
field.text: The id of this static object

field.name: Origin
field.text: The origin, offset from the parent

field.name: ModelId
field.text: Either a SetupModel or GfxObj id.

field.name: Type
field.text: This seems to always be TextureType.Texture2D in the dats.

type.name: RenderSurface
type.text: This holds raw texture data. DB_TYPE_RENDERSURFACE in the client.

vector.name: SourceData
vector.text: The source data of the texture

field.name: DefaultPaletteId
field.text: This is only set when Format is PixelFormat.PFID_INDEX16 | PixelFormat.PFID_P8.

type.name: ExperienceTable
type.text: Holds the experience required for different attributes/vitals/skill/levels, as well as the amount of skill credits obtained for each level. DB_TYPE_XP_TABLE_0 in the client.

vector.name: Attributes
vector.text: The amount of experience required to train attributes

vector.name: Vitals
vector.text: The amount of experience required to train vitals

vector.name: TrainedSkills
vector.text: The amount of experience required to train trained skills

vector.name: SpecializedSkills
vector.text: The amount of experience required to train specialized skills

vector.name: Levels
vector.text: The amount of experience required to level a character

vector.name: SkillCredits
vector.text: The amount of skill credits per level

type.name: LandBlockInfo
type.text: Stores static spawns, buildings. DB_TYPE_LBI in the client.

field.name: NumCells
field.text: The number of inside cells. These can be looked up at 0xAAAABBBB where AAAA is the landblock id and BBBB is the cell id + 0x100

vector.name: Surfaces
vector.text: A list of surface ids. These are not fully qualified so you need to or with 0x08000000 to get the file id.

field.name: EnvironmentId
field.text: The environment id. This is not fully qualified so you need to or with 0x0D000000 to get the file id.

vector.name: VisibleCells
vector.text: A list of visible cell ids
